verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, Thou and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with thee shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: and thou and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with thee shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of your \w priesthood|strong="H3550"\w*.

And thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* also of the \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* thou with thee, that they may be \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* unto thee, and \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* unto thee: but thou and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with thee \add shall minister\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of \w witness|strong="H5715"\w*.

And they shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w charge|strong="H4931"\w*, and the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of all the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*: only they shall not come \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* the \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* and the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, that neither they, nor ye also, \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

And they shall be \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* unto thee, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, for all the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*: and a \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* shall not come \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* unto you.

And ye shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: that there be no \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* any more upon the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And I, behold, I have \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: to you \add they are\add* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \add as\add* a \w gift|strong="H4979"\w* for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

Therefore thou and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with thee shall \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* your \w priest’s office|strong="H3550"\w* for every \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w within|strong="H1004"\w* the \w vail|strong="H6532"\w*; and ye shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*: I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* your \w priest’s office|strong="H3550"\w* \add unto you\add* as a \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of \w gift|strong="H4979"\w*: and the \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* that cometh \w nigh|strong="H7131"\w* shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, Behold, I also have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of mine heave \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* of all the hallowed \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; unto thee have I \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them by reason of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w*, and to thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, by an \w ordinance|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

This shall be thine of the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, \add reserved\add* from the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: every \w oblation|strong="H7133"\w* of theirs, every meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* of theirs, and every sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w* of theirs, and every trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* of theirs, which they shall \w render|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, \add shall be\add* \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* for thee and for thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

In the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it; every \w male|strong="H2145"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it: it shall be \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* unto thee.

And this \add is\add* thine; the heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of their \w gift|strong="H4976"\w*, with all the wave \w offerings|strong="H8573"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them unto thee, and to thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and to thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* with thee, by a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: every one that is \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* in thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* of it.

All the \w best|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, and all the \w best|strong="H2459"\w* of the \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, and of the \w wheat|strong="H1715"\w*, the \w firstfruits|strong="H7225"\w* of them which they shall \w offer|strong="H5414"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, them have I \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee.\f + \fr 18.12 \ft best: Heb. fat\f*

\add And\add* whatsoever is first \w ripe|strong="H1061"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which they shall \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, shall be thine; every one that is \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* in thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \add of\add* it.
Every thing \w devoted|strong="H2764"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be thine.

Every thing that \w openeth|strong="H6363"\w* the \w matrix|strong="H7358"\w* in all \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, which they \w bring|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add whether it be\add* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w* or \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w*, shall be thine: nevertheless the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* shalt thou \w surely|strong="H6299"\w* \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*, and the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* shalt thou \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*.

And those that are to be \w redeemed|strong="H6299"\w* from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* shalt thou \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*, according to thine \w estimation|strong="H6187"\w*, for the \w money|strong="H3701"\w* of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w shekels|strong="H8255"\w*, after the \w shekel|strong="H8255"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, which \add is\add* \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w gerahs|strong="H1626"\w*.

But the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of a \w cow|strong="H7794"\w*, or the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of a \w sheep|strong="H3775"\w*, or the \w firstling|strong="H1060"\w* of a \w goat|strong="H5795"\w*, thou shalt not \w redeem|strong="H6299"\w*; they \add are\add* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*: thou shalt \w sprinkle|strong="H2236"\w* their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and shalt \w burn|strong="H6999"\w* their \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \add for\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w*, for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of them shall be thine, as the \w wave|strong="H8573"\w* \w breast|strong="H2373"\w* and as the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w* are thine.

All the heave \w offerings|strong="H8641"\w* of the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, have I \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, and thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* with thee, by a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: it \add is\add* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of \w salt|strong="H4417"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* unto thee and to thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* with thee.

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, Thou shalt have no \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* in their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, neither shalt thou have any \w part|strong="H2506"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* them: I \add am\add* thy \w part|strong="H2506"\w* and thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And, behold, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* all the \w tenth|strong="H4643"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \w for|strong="H2500"\w* their \w service|strong="H5656"\w* which they \w serve|strong="H5647"\w*, \add even\add* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

Neither must the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w henceforth|strong="H5750"\w* come \w nigh|strong="H7126"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, lest they \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*, and \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.\f + \fr 18.22 \ft and die: Heb. to die\f*

But the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* shall \w do|strong="H5647"\w* the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and they shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* throughout your \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*, that \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* they \w have|strong="H5157"\w* no \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

But the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which they \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* \add as\add* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* to \w inherit|strong="H5159"\w*: therefore I have \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* they shall \w have|strong="H5157"\w* no \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Thus \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* the \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* which I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you from them for your \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, then ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* up an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of it for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add even\add* a \w tenth|strong="H4643"\w* \add part\add* of the \w tithe|strong="H4643"\w*.

And \add this\add* your heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* shall be \w reckoned|strong="H2803"\w* unto you, as though \add it were\add* the \w corn|strong="H1715"\w* of the \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w*, and as the \w fulness|strong="H4395"\w* of the \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w*.

Thus ye also shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* an heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of all your \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w*, which ye \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and ye shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thereof the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* to \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

Out of all your \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w* ye shall \w offer|strong="H7311"\w* every heave \w offering|strong="H8641"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, of all the \w best|strong="H2459"\w* thereof, \add even\add* the hallowed \w part|strong="H4720"\w* thereof out of it.\f + \fr 18.29 \ft best: Heb. fat\f*

Therefore thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, When ye have \w heaved|strong="H7311"\w* the \w best|strong="H2459"\w* thereof from it, then it shall be \w counted|strong="H2803"\w* unto the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* as the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w threshingfloor|strong="H1637"\w*, and as the \w increase|strong="H8393"\w* of the \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w*.\f + \fr 18.30 \ft best: Heb. fat\f*

And ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it in every \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, ye and your \w households|strong="H1004"\w*: for it \add is\add* your \w reward|strong="H7939"\w* \w for|strong="H2500"\w* your \w service|strong="H5656"\w* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And ye shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* no \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* by reason of it, when ye have \w heaved|strong="H7311"\w* from it the \w best|strong="H2459"\w* of it: neither shall ye \w pollute|strong="H2490"\w* the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, lest ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.
